TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerTheme extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DesignerTheme Implements IDisposable
public ref class DesignerTheme abstract : IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class. Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
Docs.value: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.

Docs.exception: A user attempted a set operation when the property was set to .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ContainingTheme As WorkflowTheme

Docs.summary: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type DesignerType { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property DesignerType As Type

member this.DesignerType : Type with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
Docs.value: A that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.

Docs.exception: A user attempted a set operation when the property was set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method. Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAmbientPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty ambientProperty) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub OnAmbientPropertyChanged (ambientProperty As AmbientProperty)

abstract member OnAmbientPropertyChanged : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty -> unit override this.OnAmbientPropertyChanged : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty -> unit

Docs.param: The enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
Docs.summary: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
Docs.value: if is read-only; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property. If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> is `false`.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed. If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
